text: Is there any information on when contact properties/variables will be supported in if statements for email? Was trying to store a contact property value in a variable to then use in an if statement to set the value of a new variable (i.e. if airport code = YVR, set airport name to Vancouver), and realized it wasn't working because if statements aren't supported in email with contact variables.
Hi Courtney, totally understand the frustration and see the use case here. Its a known issue, and it is being looked into, Unfortunately there is no timeframe to disclose at this time.
